Config.Name: Web Interface Port (HTTP)
Config.Description: This is Argilla's Web UI port you can access via a web browser.

Config.Name: Config Storage Path
Config.Description: This is where Argilla will store its data and configuration.

Config.Name: OWNER_USERNAME
Config.Description: The owner username to log in Argilla. The default owner username is owner.

Config.Name: OWNER_PASSWORD
Config.Description: This sets a custom password for login into the app with the owner username. The default password is 12345678.

Config.Name: OWNER_API_KEY
Config.Description: Argilla provides a Python library to interact with the app (read, write, and update data, log model predictions, etc.). If you don't set this variable, the library and your app will use the default API key i.e. owner.apikey.

Config.Name: ADMIN_USERNAME
Config.Description: The admin username to log in Argilla. The default admin username is admin.

Config.Name: ADMIN_PASSWORD
Config.Description: This sets a custom password for login into the app with the argilla username. The default password is 12345678.

Config.Name: ADMIN_API_KEY
Config.Description: Argilla provides a Python library to interact with the app (read, write, and update data, log model predictions, etc.). If you donâ€™t set this variable, the library and your app will use the default API key i.e. admin.apikey.

Config.Name: ANNOTATOR_USERNAME
Config.Description: The annotator username to login in Argilla. The default annotator username is argilla. By setting up a custom username you can use your own username to login into the app.

Config.Name: ANNOTATOR_PASSWORD
Config.Description: This sets a custom password for login into the app with the argilla username. The default password is 12345678.

Config.Name: LOAD_DATASETS
Config.Description: This variables will allow you to load sample datasets. The default value will be full.
